title: Why Fluence Energy (FLNC) Stock Is Nosediving
snippet: What Happened? Shares of electricity storage and software provider Fluence (NASDAQ:FLNC) fell 20.7% in the afternoon session after it reported underwhelming second-quarter financial results, which revealed a significant revenue miss and a full-year forecast that fell slightly short of Wall Street's expectations.

title: Fluence Energy (NASDAQ:FLNC) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q2 Earnings, Stock Drops 14.4%
snippet: Electricity storage and software provider Fluence (NASDAQ:FLNC) in Q2 CY2025, but sales rose 24.7% year on year to $602.5 million. The company's full-year revenue guidance of $2.7 billion at the midpoint came in 1.

title: Fluence Energy, Inc. (FLNC) Surpasses Q3 Earnings Estimates
snippet: Fluence Energy (FLNC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +150.00% and -19.88%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
